name: Interloper (itch)
description:
Interloper is a sci-fi first person shooter set on a planet consumed by an artificial intelligence. The player uses a central Hub to travel to three levels, in which they fight enemies, pick up new weapons, and complete objectives to progress. The goal is to destroy each boss at the end of the three levels.

This game was developed as a university project, there are plenty improvements and additions that could be added.
